user.title: Smart Cover Automation
user.description: Configure automatic cover control based on temperature or sun position. For detailed help, see: https://github.com/helgeklein/ha-smart_cover_automation

error.invalid_cover: One or more selected covers are not available

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of this integration can be configured

data.temp_threshold: Minimum forecast daily high temperature at which to operate (°C)
data.sun_elevation_threshold: Minimal sun elevation at which to operate
data.sun_azimuth_tolerance: Maximum horizontal angle at which the sun is considered to be shining on the window (degrees)
data.covers_max_closure: Maximum closure position (0 = fully closed, 100 = fully open)

data_description.cover_azimuth: Azimuth direction for cover (0° = North, 90° = East, etc.). Used to determine if the sun is shining on the window.
